Title: Relates to allowing city court judges to perform the duties of their position between ages 70 and 76 where they are certified to be mentally and physically able and competent
Summary: Relates to allowing city court judges to perform the duties of their position between ages 70 and 76 where they are certified to be mentally and physically able and competent.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to allowing city court judges to perform the duties of their position between ages 70 and 76 where they are certified to be mentally and physically able and competent
